metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Baked Beans Ingredients: o 4 cups cooked navy beans o 1 small onion o 1/2 cup molasses o 1/4 cup brown sugar o 1/4 cup ketchup o 1 tablespoon mustard o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper Instructions: o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).

o 4 tomatoes o 1 small onion o 1 jalapeño o 1/4 cup cilantro o 1 lime o 1 teaspoon salt Instructions: o Dice tomatoes, onion, and jalapeño. o Chop cilantro. o Combine all ingredients in a bowl. o Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and add salt. o Mix well and serve.

Green Bean Casserole Ingredients: o 4 cups green beans o 1 can cream of mushroom soup o 1/2 cup milk o 1 cup fried onions o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper Instructions: o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). o Cook green beans until tender. o Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish. o Add green beans and half of the fried onions, stir to combine. o Bake for 25 minutes. o Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes. o Serve warm.
Ingredients: 1 eggplant, diced 1 zucchini, diced 1 bell pepper, diced 1 small onion, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 4 tomatoes, diced.
